item.title: CVE-2024-31232|2024-08-02T01:46:04.977Z -- sizam%20design -- rehub
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Sizam Design Rehub allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Rehub: from n/a through 19.6.1.
